scripts.build: webpack --config ./webpack.config.js && mkdir -p dist/resources/forward-tab && mv dist/extension-forward-tab.js dist/resources/forward-tab/ && cp manifest.json dist/ && cd dist && tar -czf ../poc-argocd-forward-tab.tar.gz resources/ manifest.json && cd .. && ls -lh poc-argocd-forward-tab.tar.gz
